titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the navy. The second part containing a reply to the observations on the first part : with a discourse on the discipline of the navy, shewing that the abuses of the seamen are the highest violation of Magna Charta, and the rights and liberties of English men /

notesStmt.note: This item also appears at reel 1210:33b bound following "Observations on a pamphlet" (Wing O101).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
